location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP 44 SKETCH MAP TO ILLUSTRATE ACTION BY 7TH. CAVALRY BRIGADE NEAR HADRANIYA. 29th. October, 1918.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paperDimensions: 169 x 134mm, on sheet 215 x 315mm

mods.abstract: The map accompanies The Campaign in Mesopotamia 1914-1918. Volume IV, and shows a region around Hadraniya [Al Khaḑrānīyah] in northern Iraq, indicating military operations, settlements, roads, cultivation and watercourses. Sketch marks give some indication of relief, and a key beneath the title explains red and green symbols.Prepared in the Historical Section of the Committee of Imperial Defence, and printed at the Ordnance Survey in 1927.
